description: Public Services and Procurement Canada has a requirement on behalf of Department of Fisheries and Oceans for an Overview of Coastal and Marine Regulations, Polices, Programs, and Related Marine Data Requirements that Support the Government of Newfoundland and Labrador’s Decision Making for Incorporation into Regional Marine Spatial Planning Processes as per annex A in the Statement of work. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by November 29, 2022 at 14:00 EST.
